WRITING.TITLE: Here's my entire Green Day collection. 18 out 26 12" are on coloured vinyl. Enjoy :)

WRITING.TEXT:
Well, here in the UK. It's 21:17 (Tuesday). So it'll be sometime before we hear anything from it!
Edit- Just realised how bad I am at keeping track of days. I now realise it's Wednesday.
I also add...Don't wanna Know if You're Lonely...and perhaps Stop Drop and Roll/ Mother Mary/ Roshambo (even though the song Roshambo has nothing to do with Green Day...)

I mean, it all depends on demand and represses. It will probably increase in value since it'll be a first pressing of the album, and the fact it's red is also a bonus.
A good example would be the original Slappy E.P...black vinyl sells for roughly 20, whereas coloured has sold as much as 50. However, it's worth noting that the colour vinyl of the Slappy E.P. were limited to a certain number which increases value. But it all depends on the demand of the product at the time. I would say it's a worthy investment for the price.
Edit-Spelling

WRITING.TITLE: Nearly Senior Citizen Reacting to - 21st Century Breakdown...intro is a little slow, but I love this guy. He's reacted to a lot of Green Day, so check out the rest of his videos if you enjoyed this one! :)

WRITING.TEXT: I believe it means they will not do another pressing in red. If it were limited to a number it would say somewhere "Limited to 5,000" or whatever the number may be :)
Thank you!!!!
Well, okay, I'm talking about any music they've been featured on, such as Iggy Pop's Private Hell, and Supermarket...just anything to bulk my collection.

WRITING.TITLE: All Side Projects
WRITING.TEXT: Okay, so I'm trying to build up my collection by getting as many side bands as possible. I will list all of their projects I know, and could you let me know if I'm missing any? Thanks! :) List of bands to my knowledge(I may be missing some obvious ones as this list is from the top of my head) - Foxboro Hot Tubs....The Network...Pinhead Gunpowder...The Frustrators...Billie Joe and Norah Jones...The Lookout...Screeching Weasel...Rodeo Queens...

WRITING.TITLE: QUESTION - Do snakes/sneks show love and affection like other pets?
WRITING.TEXT: I'm very new here...like...3 minutes spent here kinda new...thank you in advance for your replies! :)

WRITING.TITLE: Pretty incredible find at my local record shop. Purchased for 18.99
Lyrics Snippets from songs of "Revolution Radio"
WRITING.TEXT: Somewhere Now - "I put the riot in patriot" .. Outlaws - "Fuck you, I'm from Oakland" .. Say Goodbye - "Teach your children well from the bottom of the well" .. I know it's nothing much, but it's something the keep the hype going!! (Taken from this week's "Kerrang!")

From my experience I'd recommend the following: Rest... Last Ride In... Restless Heart Syndrome (just don't dwell on the lyrics too much)... Warning... Misery... and most songs from Foxboro Hot Tubs' "Stop, Drop and Roll!" Especially Red Tide...
